mapper.sql: from E_LOUBAO_EVENT E, C_GP GP, C_PS PS, G_TG TG, O_ORG O, E_LOUBAO_ECODE EC
mapper.select: select O.ORG_NAME, TG.TG_NAME, PS.PS_NAME, PS.ASSET_NO, TO_CHAR(E.TRIGTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TRIGTIME, EC.EVENTNAME, E.PHASE, decode(E.HAVEALARM, 1, '有告警', '无告警') as HAVEALARM, decode(E.CLOSED, 1, '合闸', '跳闸') as CLOSED
